sniffing.title: Sniffing
sniffing.description: Phishing is a fraudulent act of impersonating trusted entities through emails, texts, or social media messages to deceive victims intorevealing sensitive information, often disguised as communication from reputable sources.

phishing.title: Phishing
phishing.description: Phishing is a fraudulent act of impersonating trusted entities through emails, texts, or social media messages to deceive victims into revealing sensitive information, often disguised as communication from reputable sources.
